submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, h: List[int], v: List[int]) -> int:
        hs = sorted(range(m - 1), key=lambda i: h[i], reverse=True)
        vs = sorted(range(n - 1), key=lambda i: v[i], reverse=True)
        cnth = cntv = 1
        ans = 0
        i = j = 0
        while cnth < m and cntv < n:
            if h[hs[i]] >= v[vs[j]]:
                ans += cntv * h[hs[i]]
                cnth += 1
                i += 1
            else:
                ans += cnth * v[vs[j]]
                cntv += 1
                j += 1
        while cnth < m:
            ans += cntv * h[hs[i]]
            cnth += 1
            i += 1
        while cntv < n:
            ans += cnth * v[vs[j]]
            cntv += 1
            j += 1
        return ans
